resources.string: "We\'ll collect raw PPG data when you wear the watch. The data will only be used for research purposes. This feature will adversely impact the battery life."
"We'll collect raw PPG data when you wear the watch. The data will only be used for research purposes. This feature will adversely impact the battery life."
Tap to turn the HBeacon feature on, so the watch battery may be slightly reduced, and you may need to pair your phone with the watch again after it reboots.
Tap to turn off the HBeacon feature, and you may need to pair your phone with the watch again after it reboots.
กำลังบันทึกข้อมูล...
อัพโหลดข้อมูล
"ไม่สามารถอัพโหลดได้ กรุณาลองใหม่อีกครั้ง"
"ไม่สามารถเชื่อมต่อได้"
ปิดโหมดเครื่องบินแล้วลองใหม่อีกครั้ง
การเก็บรวบรวมข้อมูลกิจกรรม

When turning on activity data collection, we will collect original information of sensor after you start an exercise, and stop immediately when you end the exercise. Such data will be submitted to the server as well when you submit watch issue feedback for analysis. These logs are used only for problem analysis, and will be destroyed immediately after that. During the entire process we will comply with our Privacy Policy, view details of the policy on the Amazfit Watch app.
"ไม่สามารถค้นหาข้อมูลอัตราการเต้นหัวใจ"
"ไม่สามารถค้นหาข้อมูลระดับความสูง"
